content: 1 bunny mini cuddly blankie plus making-­ up instructions this is a free pattern and not for resale a gypsycream design palinejad@yahoo co uk this material is copyright & may not be reproduced © p alinejad 2015 copying resale & redistribution is strictly prohibited 2 bunny mini cuddly blanket materials and tools 50 grams/75 metres aran or worsted weight cotton yarn a bunny 100 grams/150 metres aran or worsted weight cotton yarn b blanket 3 5mm/4us straight single pointed knitting needles 4 5mm/7us straight single pointed knitting needles safe toy stuffing black embroidery thread yarn sewing needle suggested yarns drops drops love you 5 paris rico creative cotton lily s sugar n cream this little bunny cuddly blanket is perfect for a new baby it s completely safe having embroidered eyes and features i chose cotton simply because it is absorbent and ideal to mop up all those dribbles it s suck-­ able chewable and washable the finished blanket measures approximately 11 x 11 inches or 28 x 28cms included with this pattern is a step-­ by-­ step assembly guide which is full of photos to help you assemble your mini bunny blanket note to knitter all increases are worked by knitting into the same stitch twice kfb all decreases are by working 2 stitches together this material is copyright & may not be reproduced © p alinejad 2015 copying resale & redistribution is strictly prohibited 3 blanket using 4 5mm/7us needles and yarn b cast on 3 stitches row 1 slip 1 increase in next stitch knit to the end of the row repeat row 1 until you have 60 stitches on your needle row 2 slip 1 knit 2 together knit to the end of the row repeat row 2 until your have 3 stitches left on your needle slip 1 knit 2 together pass the slipped stitch over fasten_off collar using 3 5mm/4us needles and yarn b cast on 66 stitches starting with a purl row stocking stitch 2 row purl 2 together purl 1 x 22 = 44 stitches knit 2 together x 22 = 22 stitches purl 1 row cast off bunny head starting at the back of the head using 3 5mm/4us needles and yarn a cast on 7 stitches knit 1 increase 1 knit 1 x 3 = 10 stitches purl 1 row knit 2 increase 1 knit 1 x 4 = 14 stitches purl 1 row knit 2 increase 1 knit 2 x 4 = 18 stitches purl 1 row knit 2 increase 1 knit 1 x 8 = 26 stitches starting with a purl row stocking stitch 10 row purl 3 purl 2 together purl 1 x 6 purl 2 together purl 3 = 19 stitches knit 1 row purl 4 purl 2 together purl 1 x 3 purl 2 together purl 4 = 15 stitches knit 1 row purl 4 purl 2 together purl 3 purl 2 together purl 4 = 13 stitches change to yarn b and starting with
